Screw it.

topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53744a8663687207e8090300#post_53744a8663687207e8090300
There are freeware alternatives, but I'm a rookie in C++ so I'll need to know what I'm doing before I use a alternative program.  I'm saying fuck it and waiting until I know how to do this stuff before using alternative software.

At least they're letting us use Unity for game design; they would have been outright stupid not to considering how many people use it.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53744ba16368720707b50300#post_53744ba16368720707b50300
Unity is pretty awesome for indy projects.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53744ce363687204cbe20400#post_53744ce363687204cbe20400
The irony is that a ton of studios are now starting to move towards it.  A lot of other video game engines will mess you up if with all sorts of fees hidden in the small print; unity's all like "Yeah here's the basic version and here's the pro version if you want to make games for other stuff".

There really is no comparison.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53744e526368720521ee0300#post_53744e526368720521ee0300
I'll spare you the long explanation, but if it weren't for unity there would be a huge video game crash going on right now.


Well my roommate is passed out from drinking too much and has to go to class at 8am.  He can't say I didn't warn him.  I only had about three metric cups of vodka though; that buzz wore off really fast.


Oh here's some more good news on the glbt rights front;
The court case to decide whether or not to legalize gay marriage in Oregon the group opposed to legalization can not intervene in the case.  In other words the court case to legalize gay marriage in Oregon is pretty much unopposed.
